issue.title: [CF 813] Show icon if poison/disease
issue.body:
Hello again! I am trying to work on my icons for my Brewmaster monk. One that I am not sure how to do on my own is for the skill Detox, which removes Disease or Poison. I would like to track either of those debuffs on myself and show the Detox icon so I know when I can dispel them. Spell ID is 115450

Thanks!


> Posted by CurseForge user maven1979 | Imported from CurseForge issue #813 | Raw

comments.body:
Create a buff/debuff icon that tracks "Disease; Poison".

Set the custom texture to Detox.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

That was easy. Thanks


> Posted by CurseForge user maven1979
